title: Will everyone at my LAN have good ping?
body:
Hi!

Me and my friends are having a LAN at my house. I'm just curious if my internet will handle it. I have 88 Mbit/s download and 82 Mbit/s upload. Will this handle 5+ computers with good ping?

Thank you.

replies.body: I'd make sure you're all on ethernet to make sure you're getting the most stable connection possible. Also it would be a REALLY good idea for the squad to test that connection out in some custom or practice matches first before hopping into ranked or something!
